description_info.description: Ross, Chandler, Pheobe, Monica, Rachel, and Monica are chilling by the sofa in the café. Rachel hesitantly shares the story about her dream and how she had sex with Chandler on the table. The whole group is taking it lightly as a joke but Ross takes it personally and is annoyed by it. Ross goes over to the bar to pour more coffee. Chandler, sensing that Ross is not feeling too pleased, apologizes.
Everyone is at the café talking about Rachel's funny dream
Ross is not pleased with the plot of Rachel's dream.

qa.answer: Because he has feelings for her
qa.wrong_answer3: Because he doesn't like to hear story about sex
qa.wrong_answer4: Because he has feelings about Chandler

description_info.description: The whole gang is still at the café, sitting around the sofa while Rachel is on her shift. Pheobe talks about how she is looking for a temporary job. Joey suggests she should work at Chandler's office for a short term as a secretary. Ross has bought a new beeper, for, in the case of an emergency such as Carol going into labor, she could contact him. Meanwhile, Monica is excited and getting ready to go on a date with Ethan.
The group is sitting at the café and Rachel is asking Chandler if she can work at his office for a couple of weeks
Monica is going out for a date with Ethan

description_info.description: It's Pheobe's first day at work as Chandler's secretary. Pheobe and Chandler are at the latter's office fooling around. She answers her first phone call which is from Ross. In an effort to work on his daily workload, Chandler sends Pheobe out, however, he is soon interrupted by a call from Pheobe asking him a silly question.
Chandler and Pheobe are sitting in Chandler's office.

description_info.description: Monica is actively moving around trying to prep for a date night at her apartment. She is making sure the windows and the table are clean. She checks in the oven to see how her fish is doing in the oven, only to realize that she had been cooking lasagna. Rachel is sitting on a sofa in the living room. She asks if Monica is prepared for the night with her boyfriend. Monica, a bit embarrassed to answer the question, says she doesn't have anything planned. However, when Rachel asks her if she had shaved her leg, she admits, indirectly implying that she is indeed ready to make out with her boyfriend.
Monica is preparing the house for her date while Rachel is calmly sitting in the living room
Monica seems nervous while Rachel watched everything unfold in a calm state of mind.

How is Monica acting like in the scene?
What is Rachel doing on the sofa?

description_info.description: Ross and Joey are at the café. Ross is still annoyed with Rachel's dream about having sex with Chandler. Suddenly his beeper starts ringing, however, he is called by a stranger. Chandler and Pheobe walk into the café after their day at the office. The four of them gather around the sofa in the cafe. Pheobe tells the story about how the people at the office hate Chandler for being bossy. Chandler is in disbelief. Ross, Joey, and Pheobe start mimicking Chandler's funny tone. Chandler tries to deny it, however, later speaks out his typical tone.
Ross, Joey, Pheobe, and Joey are sitting around the sofa in Central Perks
Pheobe confesses on how everyone at the office hates Chandler

description_info.description: Ross is on the phone and Pheobe is closing the fridge. Meanwhile, Rachel, Chandler, and Joey are in the living room sitting on the sofa. Rachel and Joey are reading magazines while Chandler insists that Rachel tell him about another sexual dream that she had. Rachel speaks about her dream and this time she had Joey in the dream too. Ross is disappointed he is not in her dream. again. Monica comes back from jogging with her headphones on. Rachel tells her about messages left from Ethan but she walks by. The whole group shouts Monica to acknowledge her about Ethan and starts making fun of her. Pheobe decides it's time to go out for a work party and Chandler is shocked that he is not invited. Pheobe suggests to Chandler about attending the party. However, she wants him to go separately.
Ross and Pheobe are in the kitchen while Ross, Chandler, and Joey are in the living room
Pheobe is about to hang out at a work party with Chandler not being invited.

description_info.description: Chandler and Pheobe are back at work talking about last nights party. Chandler thinks he's done enough to normalize his relationship with his co-workers. However, Pheobe tells him that they still think of him as their boss and not a friend.
Pheobe and Chandler are at Chandler's office conversating about the staff party
Chandler is not pleased that his co-workers still don't consider him as a friend.

description_info.description: Ross, Rachel, Monica, and Joey are hanging around at the café. Ross gets another beep from Andre but he ignores it. Ethan suddenly walks into the café to see Monica. Rachel asks Ross and Joey to check out the new hand dryer in order to give Monica and Ethan some space. Ethan sits with Monica on the sofa in an effort to convince her that they should keep their relationship. Monica is thankful for his feelings but she is not convinced.

description_info.description: Ross is with at Monica's apartment watching tv. Rachel has fallen asleep on the sofa. After Ross turns the tv off and puts a blanket over Rachel, she starts dreaming again. Ross waits to see who she is within her dream. Rachel calls out his name and Ross is jumping on the table with joy. However, he missteps his footing and falls on Rachel, waking her up. Suddenly, his beeper starts ringing and this it is actually from Carol. Ross is so shocked that he fell off the sofa and hurt himself.
Rachel and Ross are in Monica's apartment. Rachel is having dreams about Ross.
Ross' beeper starts beeping and Carol is finally having the baby

Joey is holding a sandwich and Monica weeping with joy about how she is going to be an aunt. After Ross gets everyone down the stairs, he comes back up to the floor and leans against the wall with a nervous look.
